title: Twisted Treeline Ranked
body: Is Twisted Treeline Ranked on OCE still going on? I've been looking for three weeks and yet Ranked isn't up each time I've looked. Is it cause it's not available on the new client? I'm not too sure because I've played one TT ranked game. I've been looking at the right time for me (7 pm NZT) and it still isn't showing up. Whether this is intended or not I kinda want to play with some mates as something to kill time with along with having some sort of competitive fun. Thanks for any answers.

replies.body:
As Tele suggested 
Its only available for 1-2 days at a certain time

From memory it does the normal twisted treeline queue and then the next day is the ranked one

That's quite strange. It's definitely available on the new client. 

Are you checking exactly at 7 pm? Or a few minutes after to give it time to update? You're also checking on Thursday and Friday right?

Yeah, it's 7 pm NZT which is the same as 5 pm AEDT. I was hyped to play it with some friends but since my first game it hasn't shown up at all. I haven't heard of any updates about the TT ranked on OCE. Every time I went on there is the normal TT but only normal TT.  No idea but thanks for the suggestion.
